summary: Henry Kesdi is a silenced classical composer and a survivor of the Holocaust. He is coaxed out from retirement by an inspired musicologist, Stefan, who convinces him to compose a complex ... See full summary »
cast: Max von Sydow|Lothaire Bluteau|Sarah Miles|Sofie Gråbøl|Aleksander Bardini|Beata Tyszkiewicz|Slawomira Lozinska|Peter Hesse Overgaard|Lars Lunøe|Trevor Cooper|Stanislaw Brejdygant|Maja Ploszynska|Eugenia Herman|Krystyna Sznerr-Mierzejewska|Wiktor Zborowski|Stanislaw Holly|Peter Thurrell|Catherine Thornborrow|Piotr Wojtowicz|Wasia Maslennikow|Krystyna Chmielewska|Eugeniusz Priwieziencew
title: El toque silencioso
